@Dumstick, please keep in mind that 720p is stand for 1280x720 resolution, this is for 16:9 ratio (1.77:1) in common screen TV, while the most used aspect ratio in movie theaters are 1.85:1 and 2.39:1, much wider like this one.
Despite the vertical resolution, if it has 1280 pixel horizontal resolution then it IS 720p, to maintain the aspect ratio.
Let's say if we are to keep the 720 pixel vertical as you expected, so the horizontal resolution will go beyond 1280 pixel which is very much useless as the TV will "shrink" the movie to 1280 pixel to fit the TV screen, so does with the vertical resolution.
Believe that if YIFY is to rip the 16:9 movie, it will have 720 pixel vertical resolution, so please stop being the smartest dude.
Anyway, thanks YIFY for the great job.

Quality Seems Fine. Thanks for the upload YIFY

A/V: 9/8

Oh and proper Summary for anyone who cares, from videosoon.com

U.S. Marine Sergeant Logan Thibault (Efron) returns from his third tour of duty in Iraq, with the one thing he credits with keeping him alive-a photograph he found of a woman he doesn't even know. Learning her name is Beth (Schilling) and where she lives, he shows up at her door, and ends up taking a job at her family-run local kennel. Despite her initial mistrust and the complications in her life, a romance develops between them, giving Logan hope that Beth could be much more than his good luck charm.

Thank you so much YIFY
